original_text: He taught my true message. He did not teach people anything that was bad. He lived in a good and honest way as he served me. He helped many people to stop doing wrong things.
korean_text: 그의 입에는 진리의 법이 있었고 그의 입술에는 불의함이 없었으며 그가 화평함과 정직함으로 나와 동행하며 많은 사람을 돌이켜 죄악에서 떠나게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: He did not teach people anything that was bad.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 나쁜 것을 가르치지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: He lived in a good and honest way
